events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but I want to return it because it doesn't fit and I'd like a refund.
The system detected keywords related to refund and return, classifying this inquiry under the Refund cluster.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request for the returned jacket.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to return your jacket and receive a refund. Iâ€™m here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in the original condition for the return?
The order number is 789654123 and yes, the jacket has not been worn and still has the tags attached as it arrived.
Thank you for the information. You can send the jacket back using the prepaid shipping label we will email you shortly, and we will process your refund within 5 business days after receiving it.
That sounds good, thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I will send it back today.
I've emailed you the prepaid return label and instructions. Please use that to ship the jacket back so we can complete your refund.
Just checking in to confirm if you have shipped the jacket back. Please let us know if you need any further help.
Yes, I dropped the package at the post office yesterday morning and have a tracking number for it.
We received the returned jacket today and have processed your refund. You should see the amount credited to your original payment method shortly.
Thank you for your patience. We are closing this case now. Feel free to contact us anytime if you need further assistance.
We have sent you a short survey to gather your feedback about your support experience today.
